Recommendations: 1. Obtain a copy of the 2011-2016 Philippine Development Plan at the NEDA website and obtain the new Regional Development Plan to support the incoming curriculum revision.
2. Revisit the sequencing and prerequisites of subject offering for continuous and logical interconnections of subjects.
3. There is a need to encourage the participation of alumni and other stakeholders (student, academe, parents, LGU, community and other National Government Agencies).
4. Faculty members are encouraged to develop their own laboratory manuals to provide effective learning.
5. Instructional materials (ex. Manuals and Power point presentations) developed by the faculty maybe properly reviewed by the Instructional Materials Committee.
6. Preserved specimens in the laboratory as instructional materials may be properly labeled.
